attributes.action: Partition to stop MP.S voting against  a NO DEAL BREXIT
attributes.additional_details:
Stop MP’s for voting against a no deal brexit . 
And to give the British people what they voted for . Leave the Eu
attributes.background: We voted leave the Eu that means with a no deal

rejection.details:
It would be up to individual MP's to decide how they vote, not the UK Government.  

If you would like the UK to leave the EU without a deal, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
